name: Bob's Loser Adventure (Wowie Jam 3)
description:
Game for Wowie Jam 3 where the topic was 

FAILURE IS PROGRESS: Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing.

Controls -
W + D/ Arrow Keys = Movement
Space + W + Up = Jump
R = Restart the Level
F = Fullscreen
E = button

This game is about points from not dying, not wasting time and collecting coins. Or doing the exact opposite. I don't care.  Theres 5 Ranks with 1 of them being the true ending (you can probably guess which one)

The story (which was cut out of the game due to time) is about an Angel guy telling Bob to get points while an Emo guy, who Bob prefers, tells him to do the opposite of what the angel said. 

QNA:

 Q:is this your first game jam game
A:yes

Q: you should've made it html5
A: too much money

Q: what are the sexualities of the characters
A: idk why you ask mr imaginary voice, but Bob is not straight. that's all you get.
